Text:
BBC Radio 1 Live in Ibiza - Essential Mix - 07-08-2010

Part 1 : Sven Vath and resident DJ Andre Galluzzi hit the decks for a special edition of the Essential Mix, recorded at Cocoon at Amnesia, Ibiza.
File Sze : 219 MB
Duration : 1.59.56
Overall bit rate : 256 kbps
Tracklist : n/a

Part 2 : Zane Lowe and Mark Ronson go back to back in a special edition of the Essential Mix recorded at Space Ibiza, plus Grandmaster Flash is on the decks.
File size : 219 MB
Duration : 1.59.54
Overall bit rate : 256 kbps

Part 3 : Pete Tong, Japanese Popstars, Underworld, Above and Beyond, and Annie Mac come live from Privilege Ibiza in this special extended edition of the Essential Mix.
File size : 548 MB

Overall bit rate : 256 kbps
